description: Stay stylish and comfortable on chilly days with the Short Short quilted coat. Its shorter length makes it a versatile jacket, perfect for car journeys or shopping trips without overheating. Filled with RDS-certified, eco-friendly, and traceable premium down, it provides comforting warmth even in temperatures as low as -20°C. The quilted shell is crafted from 100% recycled waxed nylon, offering windproof, breathable, and water-repellent protection. Complete with a hood and elasticated cuffs, this coat easily adapts to changing winter conditions.
name: Short Short Jacket - Womens

specs.value: RDS-certified gray duck down - 60% down, 40% feather, fill power of 600
